text:
can anyone confirm for me, the free email tool, does it let you use coded templates or only drag n drop templates?

It’s a personal preference. I like the drag n drop editor but for a project it’s not going to be necessary, and I like the control coded gives me

<@U7SL518D6> There's no design manager included in free/starter = you can't customize the emails too much.

See here: <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C22PU4LV8/p1563988892053700>
